results.definition: a community of people smaller than a village
a crisis situation or point in time when a critical decision must be made
examples: at that juncture he had no idea what to do
he must be made to realize that the company stands at a critical point

results.definition: a point where a choice must be made
examples: Freud's work stands at the crossroads between psychology and neurology

results.definition: a junction where one street or road crosses another
